languages.text: "Однажды я участвовал в рейде на банду мутантов — отличился в бою, был награжден и повышен до проктора". {n}Соломон выдерживает паузу.{/n} "Это все".
"There was this one time... I was part of a raid on a gang of mutants. I excelled in battle, received an award, and was promoted to Proctor." {n}Solomorne pauses.{/n} "That is all."
languages.original_text: "Однажды я участвовал в рейде на банду мутантов — отличился в бою, был награжден и повышен до проктора". {n}Соломон выдерживает паузу.{/n} "Это все".

traits.locale_text: "There was this one time... I was part of a raid on a gang of mutants. I excelled in battle, received an award, and was promoted to Proctor." {n}Solomorne pauses.{/n} "That is all."

"There was this one time... I was part of a raid on a gang of mutants. I excelled in battle, received an award, and was promoted to Proctor." {n}Solomorne pauses.{/n} "That is all."
"There was this one time... I was part of a raid on a gang of mutants. I excelled in battle, received an award, and was promoted to Proctor." {n}Solomorne pauses.{/n} "That is all."

languages.text: 「かつて一度だけ…変異体のギャングを襲撃する作戦に参加したことがあります。戦闘で優れた働きをし、表彰を受けて、代理人に昇進しました」{n}ソロモーンは一拍置いた。{/n}「以上です」
languages.original_text: "There was this one time... I was part of a raid on a gang of mutants. I excelled in battle, received an award, and was promoted to Proctor." {n}Solomorne pauses.{/n} "That is all."

traits.locale_text: 「かつて一度だけ…変異体のギャングを襲撃する作戦に参加したことがあります。戦闘で優れた働きをし、表彰を受けて、代理人に昇進しました」{n}ソロモーンは一拍置いた。{/n}「以上です」

languages.text: "Ja, einmal ... ich war Teil eines Angriffs auf eine Bande von Mutanten. Ich stach im Kampf hervor, erhielt eine Auszeichnung und wurde zum Proktor befördert." {n}Solomorne hält inne.{/n} "Das ist alles."
languages.original_text: "There was this one time... I was part of a raid on a gang of mutants. I excelled in battle, received an award, and was promoted to Proctor." {n}Solomorne pauses.{/n} "That is all."

traits.locale_text: "Ja, einmal ... ich war Teil eines Angriffs auf eine Bande von Mutanten. Ich stach im Kampf hervor, erhielt eine Auszeichnung und wurde zum Proktor befördert." {n}Solomorne hält inne.{/n} "Das ist alles."

languages.text: « Il y a bien cette mission... où j'ai participé à un assaut contre une bande de mutants. J'ai excellé au combat, on m'a décerné une récompense et j'ai été promu proctor, {n}déclare Solomorne avant de s'interrompre un instant.{/n} Voilà tout. »
languages.original_text: "There was this one time... I was part of a raid on a gang of mutants. I excelled in battle, received an award, and was promoted to Proctor." {n}Solomorne pauses.{/n} "That is all."

traits.locale_text: « Il y a bien cette mission... où j'ai participé à un assaut contre une bande de mutants. J'ai excellé au combat, on m'a décerné une récompense et j'ai été promu proctor, {n}déclare Solomorne avant de s'interrompre un instant.{/n} Voilà tout. »

languages.text: «Pues en cierta ocasión... participé en una redada contra una banda de mutantes. Destaqué en combate, me dieron una medalla y fui ascendido a Procurador». {n}Solomorne hace una pausa.{/n} «Y ya está».
languages.original_text: "There was this one time... I was part of a raid on a gang of mutants. I excelled in battle, received an award, and was promoted to Proctor." {n}Solomorne pauses.{/n} "That is all."

traits.locale_text: «Pues en cierta ocasión... participé en una redada contra una banda de mutantes. Destaqué en combate, me dieron una medalla y fui ascendido a Procurador». {n}Solomorne hace una pausa.{/n} «Y ya está».

languages.text: “有那么一次……我参加了一场针对变种人的突袭。我在战斗中表现出色，获得了嘉奖，被提拔为监察官。”{n}索罗蒙顿了顿。{/n}“就是这样。”
languages.original_text: "There was this one time... I was part of a raid on a gang of mutants. I excelled in battle, received an award, and was promoted to Proctor." {n}Solomorne pauses.{/n} "That is all."

traits.locale_text: “有那么一次……我参加了一场针对变种人的突袭。我在战斗中表现出色，获得了嘉奖，被提拔为监察官。”{n}索罗蒙顿了顿。{/n}“就是这样。”

languages.text: "Bir keresinde... Bir mutant çetesine yapılan bir baskında yer almıştım. Savaşta büyük başarı gösterdim, ödül aldım ve Üsteğmenliğe terfi ettim." {n}Solomorne duraklıyor.{/n} "Başka bir şey yok."
languages.original_text: "There was this one time... I was part of a raid on a gang of mutants. I excelled in battle, received an award, and was promoted to Proctor." {n}Solomorne pauses.{/n} "That is all."

traits.locale_text: "Bir keresinde... Bir mutant çetesine yapılan bir baskında yer almıştım. Savaşta büyük başarı gösterdim, bir ödül aldım ve Üsteğmenliğe terfi ettim." {n}Solomorne duraklar.{/n} "Başka bir şey yok."

languages.original_text: "There was this one time... I was part of a raid on a gang of mutants. I excelled in battle, received an award, and was promoted to Proctor." {n}Solomorne pauses.{/n} "That is all."
